model module

Vision Based Navigation Project Augusta University 3/11/2022

This file contains the Model class that is responsible for loading and managing the connection to the Tensorflow Model.

model.py

class model.Model(cam_index, low_memory: bool = False)[source]

Bases: object

Class Responsible for loading and managing the camera object and performing detections on images.

PATH_TO_SAVED_MODEL = '.\\resources\\model\\saved_model'
PATH_TO_LABELS = '.\\resources\\annotations\\label_map.pbtxt'
MAX_BOXES = 6
MIN_SCORE_THRESH = 0.65
__init__(cam_index, low_memory: bool = False)[source]

Sets everything up

Parameters

  • cam_index (Int) – The index of the camera to be used for the model

  • low_memory (Bool) – If on a laptop or low memory system, set True

update_detections()[source]

Gets a new picture and updates self.detections

compute_center(box)[source]

Method to compute the center of a box. Box is the normalized coords from self.detections. Used in update_centers. Not intended to be called externally.

update_centers(max_num_detections=None)[source]

Method to get the flags center from detections. Will only look at max_num_detections number of detections. Makes a call to ID.update_positions, providing the new possible positions the drones can be at.

Optional param max_num_detections

How many objects do you expect? Default is self.MAX_BOXES

draw_bounding_boxes(img=None)[source]

Method to draw the boxes and confidences around detected objects utilizing the object_detection API.

Optional param img

Specifiy the image the draw the bounding boxes on Default will take the last img from the camera object

update_vectors_thread()[source]

Method desinged to update all velocity information and draw the new information on self.thread_img. Designed to be put on a thread.

basic_detection_thread()[source]

Method desinged to update basic information. and draw on the self.thread_img. Designed to be put on a thread.

basic_detection()[source]

Same as basic_detection_thread but not for use with a thread.
